name: live-poll-bot
description: Live Poll Bot - Real-time polling application with microservices architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "api,realtime,bot" -c "blue,magenta,yellow" "cd backend/api-service && npm run dev" "cd backend/realtime-service && npm run dev" "cd backend/bot-service && npm run dev"
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:bot && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:api:coverage && npm run test:bot:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.test:migrate: cd backend/api-service && NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate
scripts.build: cd backend/api-service && npm run build && cd ../realtime-service && npm run build && cd ../bot-service && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/poll-app && npm run build && cd ../admin-app && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n "api,realtime,bot" -c "blue,magenta,yellow" "cd backend/api-service && npm start" "cd backend/realtime-service && npm start" "cd backend/bot-service && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: cd backend/api-service && npm install && cd ../realtime-service && npm install && cd ../bot-service && npm install && cd ../../frontend/poll-app && npm install && cd ../admin-app && npm install
